TestCaseDummyConditionalPunctualAction_1 Class Reference

#include <TestCaseDummyConditionalPunctualAction_1.h>

Inheritance diagram for TestCaseDummyConditionalPunctualAction_1:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Verify the services of conditional punctual actions.

One DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction object is created and the following tests are performed upon it:

  1. The correctness of the class identifier is verified.
  2. The execution flag is set to false and an execute request is made on the conditional punctual action. It is verified that the outcome is ACTION_CANNOT_EXECUTE.
  3. The execution flag is set to true and an execute request is made on the conditional punctual action. It is verified that the outcome is ACTION_SUCCESS.
See also:
DC_DummyConditionalPunctualAction

ConditionalPunctualAction

Author:
Roberto Totaro
Version:
1.0
